description: Enter a universe of creation, collaboration, and discovery. Shrecknet is your forge for worlds, characters, and adventures – powered by Generative AI and built for storytellers, players, and adventurers.
setup_first_account: Set up the first account as System Admin!
welcome_first_login: Welcome to Shrecknet! First you have to create an account!
visit_worlds_desc: Visit our ever-expanding rich RPG settings with pages, concepts and groups.
collaborate_desc: Invite players and co-writers to shape our adventures together.
talk_elders_desc: Talk to our Agentic AI NPCs about the worlds, the game rules or anything you wish.
virtual_table_desc: Jump into your online table powered by Foundry with a single click.
scribe_intro: Legendary AI Scribes await to help you craft new tales and expand your world!
scribe_select: Select a Scribe below. Each Scribe will study the lore of your world and propose new stories, characters, or secrets to enrich your universe.
scribe_pen_line: The pen is yours, but the Scribe brings it to life.
library_desc: Select tomes and scrolls for your Scribe to analyze and suggest new content!
no_lore_found: No lore found. Try a different search.
agent_settings_desc: Manage, personalize, and tune the behavior of each of your AI agents.
desc_agent_conversational: Chat with your world’s rules, lore, and personalities.
desc_agent_writer: Automate and review page creation, linking, and summaries.
desc_agent_novelist: Generate adventure hooks, session logs, and dramatic retellings.
desc_agent_specialist: Niche agents for specific game mechanics or moderation.
